name: CorionX
description: CorionX is a modern blockchain platform that acts as a hub for digital assets, and is built to promote the adoption of cryptocurrency stablecoins, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), CBDCs, and other technologies that empower users and reduce reliance on legacy infrastructure. It can be used for bounties and reward plans, membership fees, earning rewards, and a whole lot more. ♦️ CorionX token holders can earn discounts and benefits for holding and participating in the CorionX ecosystem.
